name: VR Vaporwave Drive
description:
An Endless Chase through Vaporwave Virtual Reality!

VR Vaporwave Drive transports you into an aesthetic universe in which cyber cops are chasing you and you have to dodge incoming police cars to avoid crashing!

Tilt your head / phone to avoid the cars and beat the highscore!

This new VR game in a vaporwave aesthetic full of Neon lights will bring you into a state of strange Euphoria and realxing Nostalgia while Police Cars chase you through space.

Best played with headphones to fully immerse yourself in the experience of Virtual Reality with all senses!

In this Racing Game through a different galaxy towards a Vaporwave horizon it is up to you how far you get without crashing into incoming cars!

The beautiful song you can hear while playing is called Resonance by HOME.
